name: HTTP Request Smuggling
description: Detects HTTP request smuggling vulnerabilities (CL.TE, TE.CL, TE.TE desync attacks)
cwe_name: Inconsistent Interpretation of HTTP Requests ('HTTP Request/Response Smuggling')
remediation: Use HTTP/2 end-to-end. Ensure consistent interpretation of Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding. Use same web server software throughout.
